name: Studio B - Natural Light
description: A bright, minimal space perfect for portrait, editorial, or lifestyle photography.
body: Natural light pours in all day. Features white cyc walls and modular props.

name: Studio C- Creative Make Believe
description: A dreamy, styled set for whimsical shoots and brand storytelling.
body: Hand-painted sets, props, and lighting design tailored to mood boards.

name: Studio A - Portrait Room
description: We build your set for you — custom and flexible creative options.
body: Bring your concept and let us build it — from green screen to editorial sets.
